scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run rollup && npm run es && npm run clean && npm run cjs && npm run min && npm run size
scripts.clean: sed -i.bck -e 's/var isNoOp =.*/var isNoOp = false;/' index.js && sed -i.bck 's/(exports)/(document,exports)/;s/({}));/(document,{}));/' index.js && rm index.js.bck
scripts.es: rollup --config es.config.js && sed -i.bck 's/var /\/*! (c) Andrea Giammarchi - ISC *\/var /' es.js && rm es.js.bck
scripts.min: echo '/*! (c) Andrea Giammarchi - ISC */' > min.js && uglifyjs index.js -c -m >> min.js
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c;cat min.js | wc -c;gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c;cat es.js | wc -c;gzip -c9 es.js | wc -c
scripts.copy: npm run copy:all && npm run copy:patch
scripts.copy:patch: cp plus.js esm/tagger.js && cat node_modules/lighterhtml/esm/tagger.js | sed 's/const hyperEvent =/const _hyperEvent =/' >> esm/tagger.js
